intent.user_query: What is the total sales amount for each possible combination of two product types?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT p1.ProductType AS ProductType1, p2.ProductType AS ProductType2, SUM(sd.Quantity * sd.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM fitness_db.SaleDetails sd JOIN fitness_db.Products p1 ON sd.ProductID = p1.ProductID JOIN fitness_db.Products p2 ON sd.ProductID = p2.ProductID WHERE p1.ProductType < p2.ProductType GROUP BY p1.ProductType, p2.ProductType ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;

arguments.sql: SELECT p1.ProductType AS ProductType1, p2.ProductType AS ProductType2, SUM(sd.Quantity * sd.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales FROM fitness_db.SaleDetails sd JOIN fitness_db.Products p1 ON sd.ProductID = p1.ProductID JOIN fitness_db.Products p2 ON sd.ProductID = p2.ProductID WHERE p1.ProductType < p2.ProductType GROUP BY p1.ProductType, p2.ProductType ORDER BY TotalSales DESC;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
